original_title: かちんこ！-平成任侠外伝-
overview: A scene in which yakuza members Kitayama and Takimoto devour each other's bodies before hitting them. Yao no Asakichi, the boss of the yakuza who lends the filming fund to the director, appears and presses the director to repay the loan. However, it turns out that the director does not have the ability to pay, and the distribution of the film has not been decided. Despite the upset staff, Asakichi says he will be the director...
title: Kachinko! -Heisei Ninkyo Gaiden-
